summary: Entrepreneurs visit a Chilean town, where they temporarily allow the fishing of a shellfish in danger of extinction.
cast: Emilio Bardi|Luis Dubó|Loreto Moya|Luis Margani|Tamara Acosta|María Izquierdo|Mariana Loyola|Patricia López|Carmina Riego|Pilar Zderich|Aldo Parodi|Julio Marcone|Cristián Chaparro|Gabriela Medina|Carmen Barros|Marcela Arroyave|Claudia Hidalgo|Chamila Rodríguez|Pablo Striano|Camila Videla
title: La fiebre del loco
